[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":["This section provides detailed reference documentation for working with React. For an introduction to React, please visit the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn","children":"Learn"}]," section."]}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The React reference documentation is broken down into functional subsections:"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"react","children":"React "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Programmatic React features:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react/hooks","children":"Hooks"}]," - Use different React features from your components."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react/components","children":"Components"}]," - Built-in components that you can use in your JSX."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react/apis","children":"APIs"}]," - APIs that are useful for defining components."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/rsc/directives","children":"Directives"}]," - Provide instructions to bundlers compatible with React Server Components."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"react-dom","children":"React DOM "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"React-dom contains features that are only supported for web applications (which run in the browser DOM environment). This section is broken into the following:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/hooks","children":"Hooks"}]," - Hooks for web applications which run in the browser DOM environment."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/components","children":"Components"}]," - React supports all of the browser built-in HTML and SVG components."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom","children":"APIs"}]," - The ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom"}]," package contains methods supported only in web applications."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client","children":"Client APIs"}]," - The ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom/client"}]," APIs let you render React components on the client (in the browser)."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/server","children":"Server APIs"}]," - The ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom/server"}]," APIs let you render React components to HTML on the server."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"rules-of-react","children":"Rules of React "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"React has idioms — or rules — for how to express patterns in a way that is easy to understand and yields high-quality applications:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/rules/components-and-hooks-must-be-pure","children":"Components and Hooks must be pure"}]," – Purity makes your code easier to understand, debug, and allows React to automatically optimize your components and hooks correctly."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/rules/react-calls-components-and-hooks","children":"React calls Components and Hooks"}]," – React is responsible for rendering components and hooks when necessary to optimize the user experience."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/rules/rules-of-hooks","children":"Rules of Hooks"}]," – Hooks are defined using JavaScript functions, but they represent a special type of reusable UI logic with restrictions on where they can be called."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"legacy-apis","children":"Legacy APIs "}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react/legacy","children":"Legacy APIs"}]," - Exported from the ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"react"}]," package, but not recommended for use in newly written code."]}],"
"]}]]}]]
